entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI WebView does not execute JS chart lib function on Mac #14394
  • .net maui ios ipa cant be created #14393
  • Create Release test runs for Device Tests #14390
    Backlog
  • maui .net 7 wcf Issue #14395
  • Root pages in flyout custom title view out of bounds (iOS) #14386
  • Visual State for button background not working #14385
  • Azure B2C within MAUI Mobile Apps #14380
  • WebView Navigating and Navigated Events not fired #14379
  • MAUI App works only on Visual Studio Emulator #14378
  • [WinUI] ScrollView does not layout contents if they don't change in size. #14377
    Backlog

Closed

  • Possible Memory leaks? #12048
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Display alert is popping up on all windows in MacCatalyst instead window / page requested it #14343
    Backlog
  • AddAppAction icons don't work with MauiImages in the Resources/Images folder on Android #9234
    Backlog
  • MAUI appicon and splash not updating on iOS device #14288
  • [Android] Entry control ClearButtonVisibility="WhileEditing" tap location incorrect when inside multiple nested Grids #14323
  • WeakReferenceMessenger message received multiple times in transient pages #14355
  • [Windows] ListView ItemsSource refreshing throws error after 60+ items #6905
    .NET 8 Planning
  • XamlParseException when using an Int32 value for a RadioButton #9471
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Label no longer wrapping / measuring correctly inside Grid when available size shrinks enough #14296
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Deployment Manager workaround #14398
  • Keyboard test fixes v2 #14397
  • [CI] Fix the maui-tempaltes yaml to work in the unified pipeline. #14396
  • Build Debug and Release device tests #14392
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView.RemainingItemsThresholdReached #14391
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [net7.0] Fix incorrect caching of unconstrained measures (#14373) #14389
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.2 to 4.1.3 #14384
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Windows] Align Button VisualStates behavior with other platforms #14381
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Merged

  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Button` #14280
    area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮
  • [macOS] Display alert by Window #14361
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, backport/suggested
  • Removal of the AppAction icon extension on Android #14235
  • Try to make keyboard tests more reliable #14388
  • [xamlc] fix `assembly=mscorlib` namespaces in `Release` mode #14301
    area/Xaml </>, backport/suggested
  • Fix incorrect caching of unconstrained measures #14373
    area/layout 🔲, backport/suggested
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md #14383
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Shell TitleView rendering issues on iOS 16 (#1283… #14370
    area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • Updated Templates for Blazor apps for MacCatalyst #14196
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • Strong name the build tasks for the IDE #14080
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • [net7.0] Fix edge case with Grids, *s, and unconstrained layouts #14369
    area/layout 🔲
  • [ios] cleanup Loaded/Unloaded observers #14140
    area/platform
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix clipping issues with some views #14362
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Adding ContentInsets to iOS Keyboard Scrolling #14371
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix menu item command binding (#13848) #14345
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Allow to override WebViewClient on Android WebView #14321
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
